description:
Ideal for newer skiers, this is a forgiving ski with twin mohair strips that offer consistent grip in hard or icy conditions. Elasticity in the body of the ski is designed to provide a direct kick action that takes less effort and doesn't require perfect ski technique.

  • Twin Skin technology uses 2 offset mohair mix strips for smooth, balanced gliding without grip wax
  • EF (Efficient Forward) design uses composite materials to increase elasticity in the body of the ski for a forgiving kick and an easygoing skiing experience
  • Air channel core provides torsion-free construction and stable sidewalls
name: Fischer Twin Skin Sport EF IFP Skis - Unisex
